headline: What Recent Gains and Clean Energy Policy Optimism Mean for NextEra Energy in 2025
summary: If you are thinking about what to do with your NextEra Energy shares right now, you are not alone. The stock has been on quite a ride in recent months, leaving investors weighing whether the recent gains are a sign to add more, trim the position, or simply sit tight. After rebounding more than 15.1% in the past month, NextEra has erased much of the ground it lost earlier this year, with its year-to-date return now sitting at a healthy 16.3%. Over the longer term, investors have seen the stock...
